metadata.name: 4Ummah0001
metadata.description: 4Ummah is a 1st Digital Muslim charity reminding Muslim people about the importance of giving back and reminding them about the rewards they can get by purchasing these NFTs.  Especially for those brothers and sisters, who are actively involved in the crypto space. We partnered up with One Ummah Foundation, Islamic Help and Muslim Charity (TeamMC) in order to target as many areas as possible and preliminary decision was made to focus on delivering aid in the countries.
